TopicTitle: Will KW rocketry and AIES aerospace work together?

Articles.Content: I just installed KW rocketry. WONDERFUL MOD. One of the best. But then I removed it out of my folder and put aerospace in. If I put these two mods in the same folder will they break the game or will they continue to work?

They belong in separate folders under GameData - GameData/KWRocketry and GameData/AIES_Aerospace. They should not be put in the same folder - placing a mod somewhere other than where it defaults can break a number of mods, due to the way assets are managed by the game.

You can use them side-by-side like that, and mix-and-match parts. I do this all the time.

They belong in separate folders under GameData - GameData/KWRocketry and GameData/AIES_Aerospace. They should not be put in the same folder - placing a mod somewhere other than where it defaults can break a number of mods, due to the way assets are managed by the game.

You can use them side-by-side like that, and mix-and-match parts. I do this all the time.

Alright thanks

from what i know both of these are part mods (not technically plugins as that they don't modify the base game just add parts to it). And as i know it all non plugin part mods work with all others, they may not work with each other in the game but they should not stop the game from working.
